Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.sockets

Class ServerSocketHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.sockets.SocketHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.sockets.ServerSocketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server, Remote
public class ServerSocketHandler extends SocketHandler implements Server
The ServerSocketHandler class is responsible for handling socket communication between the client and the server, implementing the Server interface.

      public RoomInfo createRoom(Client client, String roomName, int numPlayers, String creatorUsername) throws RemoteException, AlreadyInRoomException, CreateRoomException
      Creates a new room on the server.
      Specified by:
      createRoom in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - the client creating the room
      roomName - the name of the room
      numPlayers - the number of players in the room
      creatorUsername - the username of the room creator
      Returns:
      the created RoomInfo object
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      AlreadyInRoomException - if the client is already in a room
      CreateRoomException - if there is an error creating the room

      Specified by:
      joinRoom in interface Server
      Parameters:

      roomName - the name of the room
      username - the username of the client
      Returns:
      the RoomInfo object of the joined room
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      AlreadyInRoomException - if the client is already in a room
      JoinRoomException - if there is an error joining the room
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game in the room has already started

      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid
      NotYourTurnException - if it is not the client's turn

      Reconnects the client to a game.
      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface Server
      Parameters:
      c - the client reconnecting
      roomName - the name of the room to reconnect to
      username - the username to be used by the client
      Returns:
      CompleteGameInfo with game information
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      JoinRoomException - if the client cannot join the room
      AlreadyInRoomException - if the client is already in a room
